# My first post

### A randomly selected dataset (pkg datasets - cars)

```{r, echo=FALSE}

df<-datasets::cars

df %>% ggplot(aes(speed, dist)) + geom_point()+
  geom_smooth()+
  hrbrthemes::theme_tinyhand()+
  labs(title = "Speed and Distance", subtitle = "Cars 1920'")


```
